We did see Amazon deliver a particularly fantastic $199 post-Black Friday all-time low on AirPods Pro 3 recently, and while that deal is now gone, we have entered the last-minute phase of the holidays and you can still score Apple best earbuds within just $10 of the Amazon all-time low.

While it carries a $200 MSRP, you can find it starting lower at $170 at Amazon, with discounts over the year having taken the costs as low as $100, most recently during Black Friday through Cyber Monday over two weeks ago. You’re looking at the third-best price we have tracked while the $62 savings last ($92 off the MSRP), only beaten out by that $100 low and $105 rates that sporadically pop up. If you want to go bigger, you can also find the C300 DC and C300 AC 90,000mAh models starting from $162.

items.summary:

Normally fetching $1,600 at full price, discounts since its release in February have been very sparse, mostly dropping costs between $1,300 and $1,200 until last month’s Black Friday sale saw the first drop to $1,000. Now, you’re getting a second chance at that all-time low price, giving you one of the brand’s most premium robots with $600 savings. You can also browse the other robots from roborock’s armada that are seeing up to 50% discounts starting from $130.

Coming down from $130 here, we saw this rate first appear back during July’s Prime Day event, with that rate repeating regularly in the time since. Whereas we’ve seen the same camera with a 32GB microSD card go a little lower in the past, this package with an even larger 128GB microSD card is landing back at its lowest tracked price with $45 cut from the tag and would make a great gift for any drivers you know who could use the added eyes for bolstered security/protection when the unexpected occurs. You can also shop the brand’s more advanced dash cam systems in its official storefront here.

While we have seen it go as low as $220 in 2024, you’re getting the third-best price of 2025 here, with $50 savings that is only beaten by the short-lived, Prime-exclusive drops to $230 and $242 that both occurred during the small Prime Day windows in July and October.
